CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU

Continuous Built-In Test flags for IMU information

Bits 32-63 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Functions
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU()
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU(
uint32 bits
)
Parameters
bits
uint32

Value of bits 32-63 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Constants
RESPONSE_OFFSET

The offset of the 0 position of the value represented by this object in the overall BIT response Value: 32 bits

Bitmasks
GENERAL_FLAGS

0xFF000000 - Bitmask for the general IMU bit flags (bits 32-39)

SENSORS_FLAGS

0x00FFFF00 - Bitmask for the IMU sensors bit flags (40-55)

FACTORY_BITS_INVALID

0x00000001 - Factory settings invalid. Device unusable (56)

Note

These masks are shifted 32 bits to the right from the original 128 bitmask to have a 0 index at bit 32

Functions
flags
uint32 flags() const

Gets the value of the IMU flags (bits 32-63)

Returns
uint32

Value of the IMU flags

CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU_General general() const

Gets information for general IMU flags (bits 32-39)

Returns

Information for general IMU flags

sensors
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU_Sensors sensors() const

Gets information for IMU sensors flags (bits 40-55)

Returns
CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU_Sensors

Information for IMU sensors flags

factoryBitsInvalid
bool factoryBitsInvalid() const

Gets the value of the Factory Bits Invalid bit

Returns
bool

true: Factory settings invalid. Device unusable

Variables

CV7ContinuousBIT_IMU_General information for general IMU flags (bits 32-39)
